message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
private ReadTableConnectionInfo tablePicker() {
    Random r = new SecureRandom();
    ReadTableConnectionInfo table;
    Iterator<ReadTableConnectionInfo> iterator = tableLists.values().iterator();
    if (r.nextFloat() < Read.percentageTable / 100) {
        table = iterator.next(); // get first value from tableLists map
    } else {
        iterator.next(); // skip the first value
        table = iterator.next(); // get second value from tableLists map
    }
    return table;
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the Iterator.next() method to get the first and second values from the map. The first call to next() will return the first value, and the second call to next() will return the second value. If you want to skip the first value and get the second value, you can call next() twice. The first call will return the first value (which you ignore), and the second call will return the second value.
